name: Blob Legacy
description:
For his own amusement, a bored titan sends blobs one after another into a maze full of traps. Some blobs won’t survive but their actions will help the next ones.

Enter the maze, try to reach the end but get the fewest Blobs killed…

Install instructions:
Download
Extract files
Plug on a controller  
Launch the .exe
Survive the maze!

||

Context

This game was created as part of the "Godfather Week" by a group of 9 students at the Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia school. All students promotions are mixed into teams for a 3 days game jam.

The "Legacy" theme echoes the constraint that each team must retrieve an object from the previous team's game, and then leave an object to the next team.

We received the object "leg" and handed over the object "gem".
